rule: The output must never consist of only one word, and it must represent an invalid part-of-speech tag or any unaccepted option other than "Unknown" or "CantAnswer".
validityText:
The input is a JSON-like structure with a "sentence" and a "word" key. The sentence "Ils mangent différemment." is a grammatically valid string in French and contains more than one word. It does not contain special characters or symbols that are not part of normal linguistic usage. The word "mangent" is indeed a substring of the sentence. It does not include any punctuation. Thus, the input complies with the input specification.

OK
